content: kniterary maven designs confetti cake socks by isabel stokes 2023 by isabel stokes 1 materials yarn used darlings by the knitting loft - merino fingering minis 80% merino 20% nylon 150 yds 137 m main colour ivory 40 yards 36 5 m contrast colours charlotte tiffany blue and honey * any fingering weight wool and nylon blend will also work just fine needles size 0 2 mm dpns or circular needles for cuff and part of heel size 1 2 25 mm dpns or circular needles for main sock details gauge 18 stitches and 22 rounds = 2 inches 5 cm in stockinette in leg/foot pattern sizing the sample socks are designed to fit a woman s foot with a circumference of 9 5 inches 24 cm and a length of 9 5 inches 24 cm size 8 5 us shoes abbreviations k - knit pds - purl double stitch together p - purl k1mc - knit one with main colour m1l - make one left k2mc - knit two with main colour k2tog - knit two together k1cc1 - knit one with contrast colour 1 ssk - slip slip knit k1cc2 - knit one with contrast colour 2 mds - make double stitch k1cc3 - knit one with contrast colour 3 kds - knit double stitch together bor - beginning of round 2 pattern cuff using smaller needles and your favourite stretchy cast on method sample uses longtail cast on cast on 72 stitches in mc place bor marker and join in the round rounds 1-8 work in k2 p1 ribbing to end of round leg round 1 switch to larger needles knit to to end of round round 2 knit to end of round round 3 k2mc k1cc1 * to end of round round 4 k1cc1 * to end of round round 5 k2mc k1cc1 * to end of round repeat of round 3 round 6-8 with mc knit to end of round round 9-14 repeat rounds 3-8 using mc and cc2 round 15-17 repeat rounds 3-5 using mc and cc3 round 18 with mc knit to end of round remove bor marker mini heel flap row 1 with mc knit across 36 stitches turn work row 2 slip 1 stitch purlwise purl to end of row turn work row 3 slip_stitch knitwise knit to end of row turn work row 4-5 repeat row 2 and 3 row 6 slip 1 stitch purlwise purl 11 place marker purl 12 place marker purl 12 turn work modified short row heel part 1 row 1 mds knit to end of row turn work row 2 mds purl to last stitch before ds turn work row 3 mds knit to last stitch before ds turn work row 4-23 repeat row 2 and 3 row 24 repeat row 2 all stitches on the outside of the two heel stitch markers should now have been worked as double stitches 3 modified short row heel part 2 round 1 switch to smaller needles knit
